data.partBlankContent: The majority of Swaziland's population is ethnically Swazi, mixed with a small number of Zulu and White Africans, mostly people of British and Afrikaner descent. Traditionally Swazi have be__ subsistence far____ and her____, b__ most n__ mix su__ activities wi__ work i_ the gro____ urban for___ economy a__ in gover_____. data.fullContent: The majority of Swaziland's population is ethnically Swazi, mixed with a small number of Zulu and White Africans, mostly people of British and Afrikaner descent. Traditionally Swazi have been subsistence farmers and herders, but most now mix such activities with work in the growing urban formal economy and in government. Some Swazi work in the mines in South Africa.
data.answer: 斯威士兰的大多数人口是斯威士兰人，与少数祖鲁人和非洲白人混居，大多数是英国人和南非人的后裔。传统上，斯威士兰人是自给自足的农民和牧民，但现在大多数人将这些活动与日益增长的城市正规经济和政府工作结合起来。一些斯威士兰人在南非的矿山工作。
